name: Escape The Planet (Salv)
description:
Your craft has been shot down, there is only one way off of this planet and that is to raise the 250 credits needed for a teleport. Survive waves of enemy and raise the credits. Each kill rewards a credit or two and can be saved or invested into barriers or turrets. You have only limited energy to kill with from your drone but it can be recharged near to your crashed craft. Enemy will approach from the left.

WASD for movement

SPACE for energy laser or to build if in build menu.

Q to open or close build menu, use up or down to navigate through items.

E remove building.

I didnt get as much done as I wanted but I had to upload it after the effort I had put in, hopefully even in this state it may offer you some fun. 

Good luck everybody with your own entries.
